posts.title: Spring Fundraiser Exceeds Goal
posts.excerpt: Our community helped us surpass our goal of $50,000 for this year's spring fundraising campaign.
posts.bodyMarkdown:
# Spring Fundraiser Success

We are thrilled to announce that our Spring Fundraiser has exceeded all expectations! Thanks to the incredible generosity of our community, we raised over $65,000 - surpassing our goal by 30%.

## Impact

This funding will directly support:
- Construction of 2 additional homes this year
- Volunteer training programs
- Tool and equipment upgrades

## Thank You

We extend our heartfelt gratitude to all donors, volunteers, and community partners who made this success possible.
posts.author: Habitat Rowan

posts.title: Volunteer Appreciation Month
posts.excerpt: Celebrating our amazing volunteers who donated over 2,000 hours in February alone.
posts.bodyMarkdown:
# Celebrating Our Volunteers

February was Volunteer Appreciation Month, and we couldn't be more grateful for our incredible team of volunteers who continue to make our mission possible.

## By the Numbers

- **2,000+** volunteer hours in February
- **150** active volunteers
- **3** homes currently under construction

## Special Recognition

We want to give special thanks to our regular volunteers who show up week after week, rain or shine, to help build homes and hope in our community.
posts.author: Habitat Rowan
